refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: mysql_get_proto_info returns the protocol version used by connection link_identifier. If link_identifier is omitted, the last opened connection will be used.

example.title: mysql_get_proto_info example
example.programlisting:
<?php
    mysql_connect("localhost", "mysql_user", "mysql_password") or
        die("Could not connect: " . mysql_error());
    printf("MySQL protocol version: %s\n", mysql_get_proto_info());
?>
example.para: The above example would produce the following output:

refsect1.para: See also mysql_get_client_info, mysql_get_host_info and mysql_get_server_info.
